item.title: Introducing myself
item.description: Who am I? My name is Johannes Ptaszyk. I located and born in Bottrop, Germany and I identify as european. Also I identify as the following: Software developer Political being Nature lover Music lover What do I do? Currently I am working as a Junior in the Android development team at G Data Software AG. I recently joined the german party Bündnis 90/Die Grünen to bring some new ideas to the german politics. What is this website about?
